name: Cute 'Em Up!
description:
Cute 'Em Up!

Shoot and dodge the objects on the screen, catch the yellow hearts! It's cute and addictive!

There are 3 player types in the game, each of them has different amount of Hit Points and different shooting speed. Game gets harder as you play - there are 5 levels in the game, each of them has different object types and backgroung. Level 5 includes animated boss. There are more than 140 items in the game! 

You can read more information about the levels and controls in the Game's README file.

I really hope you enjoy this game!
